bean.description: Representation of object selection data

property.name: normalizedCode
property.description: The normalized code

bean.description: Representation of a cost center. This base bean has no relationship fields to other Org Unit WsDTOs

property.name: originalCode
property.description: The original code of the cost center. Deprecated since 2005.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the cost center

property.name: active
property.deprecated: since 2005, read-only, used for display purposes
property.description: Indication of whether the cost center is active. Deprecated since 2005. Read-only, used for display purposes.

property.name: activeFlag
property.description: Boolean flag of whether the cost center is active.

property.name: code
property.description: The code of the cost center

property.name: currency
property.description: The currency of the cost center

bean.description: Representation of a cost center. This bean may have relationships to other Org Unit WsDTO, whose type are WsDTO beans as well.

property.name: unit
property.description: The parent unit of the cost center

property.name: assignedBudgets
property.description: Budgets assigned to this cost center

bean.description: Representation of a cost center. This bean is shallow, which means its potential relationship fields to other Org Unit fields are simple ids. No Org Unit WsDTO fields should be declared in this bean to avoid circular references.
Representation of a cost center list

property.name: costCenters
property.description: List of cost centers

property.description: List of sorts

property.name: pagination
property.description: Pagination items

property.description: Boolean flag of whether organizational unit represented by the node is active

property.name: children
property.description: Child nodes of the organizational unit node

bean.description: Details of an order approval permission result related to an order

property.name: approverName
property.description: Name of the approver responsible for this permission result.

property.name: approverNotes
property.description: Any comments the approver added to the approval item.

hints.hint: The order is rejected due to insufficient budget

property.name: permissionType
property.description: Permission type related to the permission result.

property.name: statusDisplay
property.description: Status of the order approval.

bean.description: Details of one order approval record

property.name: permissionTypes
property.description: List of permission types related to this approval record.

property.name: approver
property.description: Principal responsible to this approval record.

property.name: statusDisplay
property.description: Status of the order approval.

property.name: comments
property.description: Any comments the approver (or the workflow system) added to the approval item.

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on Budget data. This base bean has no relationship fields to other Org Unit WsDTOs

property.name: active
property.description: Boolean flag of whether the Budget is active

property.name: budget
property.description: Value of Budget

property.name: code
property.description: Code of the Budget

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the Budget

property.name: currency
property.description: Currency of the Budget

property.name: startDate
property.description: The start date of the Budget

property.name: endDate
property.description: The end date of the Budget

property.name: selected
property.description: Boolean flag whether the budget is selected for a cost center

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on Budget data. This bean may have relationships to other Org Unit WsDTO, whose type are WsDTO beans as well.

property.name: orgUnit
property.description: The unit of the Budget

property.name: costCenters
property.description: List of Cost Centers

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on Budget data. This bean is shallow, which means its potential relationship fields to other Org Unit fields are simple ids. No Org Unit WsDTO should be declared in this bean to avoid circular references.
Representation of a Budget List

property.name: budgets
property.description: List of Budgets

property.description: List of sorts

property.name: pagination
property.description: Pagination items

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on Order Approval Permission Type data. Typical permission types are: B2BBudgetExceededPermission, B2BOrderThresholdTimespanPermission and B2BOrderThresholdPermission

property.name: code
property.description: Code of the Order Approval Permission Type

property.name: name
property.description: Name of the Order Approval Permission Type

bean.description: Representation of an Order Approval Permission Type list

property.name: orderApprovalPermissionTypes
property.description: List of Order Approval Permission Types

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on Order Approval Permission data.

property.name: active
property.description: Boolean flag of whether Order Approval Permission is active

property.name: orderApprovalPermissionType
property.description: Type of the Order Approval Permission

property.name: code
property.description: Code of the Order Approval Permission

property.name: currency
property.description: Currency of the Order Approval Permission, used for type B2BOrderThresholdPermission and B2BOrderThresholdTimespanPermission

property.name: periodRange
property.description: Period range of the Order Approval Permission, used for type B2BOrderThresholdTimespanPermission

property.name: orgUnit
property.description: Order Approval Permission's organizational unit

property.name: threshold
property.description: Threshold value of the Order Approval Permission, used for type B2BOrderThresholdPermission and B2BOrderThresholdTimespanPermission

property.name: selected
property.description: Boolean flag of whether the user is selected

bean.description: Representation of a Order Approval Permission List

property.name: orderApprovalPermissions
property.description: List of Order Approval Permissions

property.name: sorts
property.description: List of sorts

property.name: pagination
property.description: Pagination items

bean.description: Details of one specific order approval

property.name: code
property.description: Code that identifies the approval.

property.name: order
property.description: Order linked to this approval.

property.name: approvalDecisionRequired
property.description: Boolean flag which states whether an approval decision is required.

property.name: customerOrderApprovalRecords
property.description: Customer approval records related to this order approval.

property.name: merchantOrderApprovalRecords
property.description: Merchant approval records related to this order approval.

property.name: trigger
property.description: Replenishment trigger if this is an approval for a replenishment order.

bean.description: Decision for an order approval

property.name: decision
property.description: Decision from the approver when approving/rejecting an order. Typical decisions are: APPROVE, REJECT

property.name: comment
property.description: Any comments the approver (or the workflow system) adds when approving/rejecting an order.

hints.hint: Rejected because montly budget was exceeded

property.name: orderApprovals
property.description: List of Order Approvals

property.description: Pagination items

bean.description: Request body fields required and optional to operate on Replenishment Order data.

property.name: active
property.description: Is the Replenishment Order active

property.name: trigger
property.description: Trigger for the replenishment order

property.name: firstDate
property.description: First date of the replenishment order

property.name: replenishmentOrderCode
property.description: Unique code for the replenishment order

bean.description: Representation of a Replenishment Order List

property.name: replenishmentOrders
property.description: List of Replenishment Orders

property.name: sorts
property.description: List of sorts

property.name: pagination
property.description: Pagination items

bean.description: Representation of a Trigger

property.name: activationTime
property.description: The time the trigger will be activated

property.name: displayTimeTable
property.description: Description of when the trigger is being activated

bean.description: Representation of a Schedule Replenishment Form

property.name: replenishmentStartDate
property.description: First day for replenishment order

property.name: numberOfDays
property.description: How frequent replenishment should be activated expressed in days. Mandatory with 'recurrencePeriod=DAILY'.

property.name: numberOfWeeks
property.description: How frequent replenishment should be activated expressed in weeks. Mandatory with 'recurrencePeriod=WEEKLY'.

property.name: nthDayOfMonth
property.description: On which date of month replenishment should be activated. Mandatory with 'recurrencePeriod=MONTHLY'.

property.name: recurrencePeriod
property.description: Replenishment recurrence period. Available values are DAILY, WEEKLY and MONTHLY. DAILY requires 'numberOfDays'. WEEKLY requires 'daysOfWeek' AND 'numberOfWeeks'. MONTHLY requires 'nthDayOfMonth'.

property.name: daysOfWeek
property.description: List of days of week on which replenishment should occur. Mandatory with 'recurrencePeriod=WEEKLY'.
